Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Overland Drive, south of the Oceancrest Arena.
Room.LongDescription: Ironically, across the street from the Oceancrest Central Arena is the Davis Brothers Mortuary, where all the bodies of those who ended up on the wrong side of the sword in the arena usually end up. The entrance to the Mortuary is located on either Eidenhoft Boulevard to the east or Marina Way, to the west.
